text: Rona Anderson (3 August 1926 - 23 July 2013) was a Scottish actress. She was known for her roles in Whose Life Is It Anyway?, Sleeping Car to Trieste, The Prime of Miss Jean Brodie, and Floodtide. Anderson was born on 3 August 1926 in Edinburgh, Scotland. She was raised in Ottawa, Canada. Anderson was married to Gordon Jackson from 1951 until his death in 1990. They had two sons, Roddy and Graham. Anderson died on 23 July 2013 in Edinburgh, Scotland from natural causes, aged 86.Death of Rona Anderson , Daily Telegraph, 26 July 2013 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1926 births Category:2013 deaths Category:Actors from Edinburgh Category:Actors from Ottawa Category:Scottish movie actors Category:Scottish stage actors Category:Scottish television actors Category:Scottish voice actors
title: Rona Anderson
